meanings.definition: A document issued by an employer to an employee detailing the employee's earnings and deductions.
meanings.sent1: I always check my payslips to see how much money I earned.
meanings.sent2: She kept all her payslips in a folder for tax purposes.
meanings.sent3: The payslips were like little money reports from work.
meanings.sent4: Her payslips were like windows into her financial life.
meanings.sent5: The payslips fluttered in the wind, revealing her hard work.
